executive_summary.overview: This executive summary presents a comprehensive threat model for the Azure Web Application Architecture project, highlighting key risks, compliance status, and strategic recommendations to enhance security posture and operational resilience.
key_findings: High risk of SQL Injection and DoS attacks necessitates immediate mitigation strategies.
Credential stuffing poses a significant threat due to weak password policies.
Current access controls for Azure SQL Database require enhancement to prevent unauthorized access.
strategic_recommendations: Implement a comprehensive security training program focusing on secure coding practices and incident response.
Conduct regular security assessments and penetration testing to identify and remediate vulnerabilities.
Establish a cross-departmental security task force to oversee compliance and risk management efforts.
next_steps: Conduct a workshop to discuss shared threats and mitigation strategies.
Develop a detailed implementation plan for recommended actions.
Schedule regular reviews of the threat model to adapt to emerging threats.
